description: Complete system overview documenting the core architecture, primary components, and high-level data flow of the cognitive music platform, including the brain type profiling system and personalized audio delivery system
Detailed documentation of the brain type calculation algorithms, OCEAN scoring system, ADHD/ASD indicators, and how these map to channel recommendations and music preferences
Comprehensive documentation of the slot-based playlist generation system, including energy level transitions, track selection algorithms, and scoring mechanisms
Complete documentation of data models and relationships between users, cognitive profiles, channels, tracks, playlists, and slot strategies with their associated metadata
Technical documentation of the audio delivery system, including HLS implementation, multi-CDN strategy, bitrate ladder, and iOS-specific optimizations
